name: Hyper Hentai Sister Nun
description:
Hyper Hentai Sister Nun is a relaxing puzzle game.
With the theme of sister nun and multiple unique sexy girls.
Enjoy sexy girls pictures and relaxing music to complete the puzzle.

GamePlay

Swap puzzle pieces to complete levels and unlock more viewing modes.
Watch the full picture after completing the puzzle.

Feature

  • Sexy girls pictures & Relaxing music
  • Fullview mode after completing a level
  • "Enter" key to quickly complete the current level
  • " ← →" arrow keys to quickly switch between levels
